Generator

What is generator

generator-napi-module is a module to quickly generate a skeleton module using N-API, the new API for Native addons. This module automatically sets up your gyp file to use node-addon-api, the C++ wrappers for N-API and generates a wrapper JS module. Optionally, it can even configure the generated project to use TypeScript instead.
